name: Timeless Anchor
loreDescription: They say that the ship held down with that anchor is able to endure all strong winds.
- Written by Louis [The Adventures of Louis Van Vrista, Pg. 51]

skillDescription.base: Has a 25.0% chance to dispel one debuff when attacked.
skillDescription.max: Has a 50.0% chance to dispel one debuff when attacked.
